title: A Novel Experience
author: doppleganger
citation: doppleganger. "A Novel Experience: experience with 4-AcO-DALT (ID 66631)". Erowid.org. Oct 31, 2007. erowid.org/exp/66631
report:
9:00pm EST tapped out about 35 mg 4-aco-dalt and placed on tongue

very bitter and persistant taste

9:30 in chat talking to someone and it really started to comeup

I then laid down in bed to watch CSI Miami

10:00 having sex is great but I cant nut

very playful and (p)silly at the time

10:30 deep respiration and some mild visuals if I concentrate on them

I didnt look at a clock for a while so I was watching Aqua Teen Hunger Force

everything was funnier than usual

1:00 started to come down some chest tightness similar to DMT

1:30 smoked some resin and the psilly feelings came back

3:00 finally baseline again

I could have taken more and had a more intense experience I believe

very similar to shrooms in the drunken walk

and the joints feeling very odd movement is pleasant

I was rubbing my feet together for a good while and also rubbing my head

never got past a +2 but I would do it again

next time I would smoke herb during the peak
